casebody.data:
MOTION DOCKET

93-2592. State v. Berry.

Cuyahoga App. No. 60531. This cause is before the court for further consideration upon the filing of a motion for stay and a renewed motion for additional evaluation of appellant’s competence to forgo challenges to convictions and death sentence filed by the Ohio Public Defender.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that appellee may file responses to the motions no later than 12:30 p.m. today, February 18,1999.
